item.title: TLSTTS - 2019 Season Week 1 Analysis
item.description: Week One Analysis And we’re back with more nerd stuff. As long as Sleeper keeps easily delivering this data through their API, I can keep making these. My goal is to set things up so I can pretty much push a button and they will generate each week. But for that to happen, I’ll really have to have the content nailed down which won’t be possible until a few weeks have passed.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a site set up by Nick Criswell, mostly for fantasy sports analytics. The site was built using Hugo’s Lithium theme and created via the blogdown package in R.
